pages.text: To power your Farm and have it automatically harvest crops, you will need at least one Farm Gearbox.$(br2)Farm operations can be hasted with additional Gearboxes.$(br2)$(#FC5454)Redstone Flux Energy$(br)Each Farm Gearbox requires Redstone Flux Energy (RF) in order to work. You can supply them, by connecting any RF power source.
$(#A800A8)Speeding farm$(br)Each gearbox basically tells the farm to run 1 work unit, so multiple gearboxes tells the farm to do work more often.
